params.appCID_: The app cid of the deal
params.depositAmount_: The deposit amount of the deal
params.maxWorkersPerProvider_: The max workers per provider of the deal
params.minWorkers_: The min workers of the deal. Deel will be activated only if the number of workers is greater
params.paymentToken_: The payment token of the deal. User can choose any ERC20 token for payment
params.pricePerWorkerEpoch_: The price per worker per epoch of the deal
params.providersAccessList_: The providers access list of the deal
params.providersAccessType_: The providers access type of the deal (None, Whitelist, Blacklist)
params.targetWorkers_: The target workers of the deal. It's the max number of workers for the deal

hasDeal(address).details: Returns true if the deal exists
